sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.AJAXSetProgressStatus</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description>Set child execution tracker state as fail</description>
        <name>AJAXSetProgressStatus</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var AJAXSetProgressStatus = Class.create();
AJAXSetProgressStatus.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	
	setProgressStatus: function() {
        var executionID =  this.getParameter('sysparm_execution_id');
		var gr = new GlideRecordSecure('sys_execution_tracker');
		
		gr.addQuery('parent', executionID);
		gr.query();

		while (gr.next()) {
			if (gr.state == "0") {
				gr.state = "3";
				gr.update();
			}
		}

    },

    type: 'AJAXSetProgressStatus'
});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2016-05-16 17:44:57</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>4312b3e30b13120004c1c71437673a6e</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>AJAXSetProgressStatus</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Active Transaction Management" source="com.glide.transactions">eaf001cb6d2620100acb70b3534330d8</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_4312b3e30b13120004c1c71437673a6e</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2016-05-16 21:42:15</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>484</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
